Class Dragon

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Troop
        • Dragon
  • public class Dragon
extends Troop

    Dragon Class

    Subclass of Troop superclass, shoots fireballs at both Troop and Establishments targets. Moves at a speed of 2, and can also move while shooting within a certain range. Shoots fireballs extremely quickly, and does splash damage to troops at the exact same position. Radius splash damage was removed as that made the troops and buildings unbalanced. Once fireballs reach a certain distance away from its dragon, they dissapear, recreating the real life effect. A sound is also played every 10 fireballs, to make sure it doesn't get hectic. Once the dragon's health reaches 0 or below, it will die, leaving behind a sound effect and a disappearing skull.
    Version:
    April 2021
    Author:
    Andrew Qiao
